channel.title: I need some EXPERIANCED PROGRAMMERS! (Coders) help
channel.description:
I am trying to change stuff on my server. If im going to change something on the server do I have to compile after or something to get the things to work afterword?
And Im looking for a few more things.
Im looking to learn how to...
1. Remove objects. 2. Add things. 3. Create new zones (already existant ones) Like admin/mod/owner zones.
I also want to know how to...
- Make a portal to Castle Wars. So people can like play CW on my server.
- Make the Fight Caves minigame in my server. With jad as the boss and ect.
- Change what shops sell/prices of items.
- Change the amount of Xp you get when training on like the prayer alter and statue and ect.
I think thats it.. Lol...
Call me a noob programmer all you want. I won't consider it spam. I know I am a noob. But Help me please? That't what this forum is for isn't it?
__________________________________________________________
P.S. I am running a normal server. I want to get that silab junk now. How would I get onto a silab server/run a silab server?
I want to get all that junk in a server to use :).. ___________________________________________________________
PLEASE HELP ME OUT!

item.title: I need some EXPERIANCED PROGRAMMERS! (Coders) help
item.dc:creator: @Kyle11594 Kyle11594
item.description:
@Kyle11594 wrote:

Can you link the thread of add and removing stuff for me?

Like copy and paste it here please?

Read full topic

item.title: I need some EXPERIANCED PROGRAMMERS! (Coders) help
item.dc:creator: @veki94 veki94
item.description:
@veki94 wrote:

To add objects find this in your client.java public void NewObjects()
And under this add the new object like this

makeGlobalObject(xcords, ycords, objectID, Facing, 10);

I’ll edit the others after I ate my launch.

Read full topic
